body:

Decided to an AMA, just cuz'
So ask away...

title: Cammy's AMA :D

replies.body:
1. Do you know who I am?
2. If you don't we should get to know each other.
3. How old are you?
4. How many times did you apply for mod before you got it? Were you picked?
5. What other servers do you play besides avic.us?

You are a good person to talk to and I enjoy watching your content.

Jeez, I don't know..

Somewhere with half-decent internet :)

A penguin!! I really love penguins..

I haven't seen them play that much but they aren't bad, I can see them going far in future tourneys.

replies.body: Opinions on me?
replies.body_tagged: Opinions on me?

replies.body: Great player and I love having you on the staff team and working with you as a staff member!
replies.body_tagged: Great player and I love having you on the staff team and working with you as a staff member!

replies.body: opinions on me cheers
replies.body_tagged: opinions on me cheers

replies.body:
Great admin back in the day. 
To be honest, you were one of the reasons why I applied for staff, a great person to talk and all-round Aussie wombat cool kid.
replies.body_tagged:
Great admin back in the day. 
To be honest, you were one of the reasons why I applied for staff, a great person to talk and all-round Aussie wombat cool kid.

replies.body:
Opinions on Avicus?
Do you think the server can get big again by the end of this year? (200-500 players)
Opinions on ME?!
replies.body_tagged:
Opinions on Avicus?
Do you think the server can get big again by the end of this year? (200-500 players)
Opinions on ME?!

replies.body:
A great server with a great community. Although it can be better, it isn't perfect but I keep coming back every day.

It's possible, Atlas update sounds promising.

Good to talk to and always fun to be around.

replies.body:
You basically taught be how to Moderate so I am thankful for that. Now you are a cool kid ref with a cool kid retired rank.

I like it, it's easy for community members to talk to each other daily without the need for skype and teamspeak.
